name: Eat The Floppa!
description:
This is a small little mini-game called Eat The Floppa! You play as Bingus and go around eating Floppas and collecting points, this is the very beginning and is starting out to just be a prototype of design and code for an upcoming unannounced game, have fun! *NOTE* if this gets popular enough, i can make more levels and it can actually become a game! 

Controls: 

Run- Arrow Keys (< and >)

Jump - Space Bar 

That's it for now, enjoy eating some Floppas for a few minutes!

btw the pink enemies are bingus cum.
